snippet: Talks fall apart on a merger of EADS and BAE Systems. | A Wall Street job is "good work if you can get it," New York State's comptroller says. | In a new lawsuit, United States prosecutors are claiming Wells Fargo deceived the federal government...
abstract: Talks fall apart on a merger of EADS and BAE Systems. | A Wall Street job is "good work if you can get it," New York State's comptroller says. | In a new lawsuit, United States prosecutors are claiming Wells Fargo deceived the federal government about the quality of mortgages. | The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is resisting Wall Street's efforts to temper Dodd-Frank.
